data.actual_result: The cursor stays, and the first emoji is highlighted.
data.expected_result: Cursor moves to the left, so that I can fix a typo
data.short_description: Left arrow key when searching reactions won't let me move the cursor to the left. Instead, it selects the first emoji available
data.steps_to_repro: - Open up the emoji modal - Start typing something, and make sure there are some emotes that match - Press the left arrow key
